message.body:
Hey, so for the first cake I can do the ribbon trim out of icing and the roses out of "hard" icing so that everything is edible. Matching cupcakes I can put a single rose on each with two-tone icing....
Cake + cupcakes = $175.
The last cake with the polka dots, I would get a bow out of real ribbon for the top. Everything else would be edible except the bow. Matching cupcakes would also have dots, either out of icing or sugar beads......
Cake + cupcakes = $170.
Ok. Let me get back to u in a day or so. Is that ok?
How many people will the cake feed?
1 st one. I will call u later
Should feed 55-75 people. Depending on how you big or small you cut the slices. Each tier will be a two layer cake. Then you have the 24 cupcakes...
I get done work about 8:00, is that too late?
No. Just call me when u settled.
Hey sorry i didnt answer ur call. Do u have a minute?
Just ask for me, we don't have extensions here
